m_szDocTitle: High Melt Flow PEAK compositions - SOLVAY SPECIALTY POLYMERS USA, LLC.
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- High Melt Flow PEAK compositions United States Patent Application 20150225522 Kind                 Code: A1 Abstract: A composition [composition (C)] comprising at least one poly(aryl ether ketone) polymer having a melt flow rate (MFR) equal to or higher than 8 g/10 min at 400° C. and under a load of 2.16 kg, [(PAEKHMF) polymer], from 0.1 to 50 wt. % of at least one poly(tetrafluoroethylene) polymer having a D50 particle size equal to or below 10 μm, and having a melt viscosity equal to or lower than 1×105 Pa·s at 372° C., from 0 to 50% wt. % of at least one po
